HAPPDINE_DESCRICAO_1: HAPPDINE started with an idea proposed in January 2024 at the 6th edition of the HACKATHON, an internal seven-day event held by CaP/ETS (Engineering Technical School), where it received the first-place award.
HAPPDINE_DESCRICAO_2: Composed of members from Digital Solutions from classes 08, 09, and 10, HAPPDINE consists of 7 developers: Adailton da Silva Filho, Ana Beatriz Nardy Torrecilas, Isabela Pereira Leite, Isabela Rocha dos Santos, João Vitor de Souza Goulart, Murilo Silva dos Santos, and Sara de Oliveira Fernandes.
CONHECA_INTEGRANTES: Meet the members of the HAPPDINE team
